thread.title: Shirley Percival
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Shirley Percival

author: Shirley Percival
title: Shirley Percival
text: I chose a fabulous wax jacket, which arrived safely and quickly but unfortunately I needed a larger size. Although it was a busy time over Christmas, Country Attire couldn't have been more helpful and courteous. I received the correct size and am extremely happy with the quality of service I received. I would recommend Country Attire to all my friends.
